A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Last Jedi seems to ‪pander to the lowest common denominator with gratuitous “cute” creatures\, a five minute space commute back and forth from gambling planet to war zone and misc. dead-end story lines. I’m a real person with an honest opinion of this film. I’m not sure why people assume the bad reviews are bots because they seem spot-on to me.
